text: Sections 6-651.01 and 6-651.02 shall not be administered in such a way as to discriminate against any foreign government on the basis of the race, color, or creed of any of its citizens.

title.text: Housing and Building Restrictions and Regulations. (Refs & Annos)

chapter.text: Zoning and Height of Buildings. (Refs & Annos)

heading.catch_text: Discrimination against foreign government based on race, color, or creed prohibited.
